description: This file declares APIs and data structures related to Ethernet link configuration and management, including functions to get and set parameters, validate, commit, and rollback changes, as well as handling marking objects within the device.
external_files: other standard headers that are implicitly included or used

methods.name: EthLink_GetEntryCount
methods.description: Retrieves the number of Ethernet link entries.

methods.name: EthLink_GetEntry
methods.description: Fetches a specific Ethernet link entry based on index.

methods.name: EthLink_GetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Gets a boolean parameter value for a specific Ethernet link.

methods.name: EthLink_GetParamUlongValue
methods.description: Gets an unsigned long parameter value for a specific Ethernet link.

methods.name: EthLink_GetParamStringValue
methods.description: Gets a string parameter value for a specific Ethernet link.

methods.name: EthLink_SetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Sets a boolean parameter value for a specific Ethernet link.

methods.name: EthLink_SetParamUlongValue
methods.description: Sets an unsigned long parameter value for a specific Ethernet link.

methods.name: EthLink_SetParamStringValue
methods.description: Sets a string parameter value for a specific Ethernet link.

methods.name: Marking_GetEntry
methods.description: Fetches a specific marking entry based on index.

methods.name: Marking_IsUpdated
methods.description: Checks if marking data has been updated.

methods.name: Marking_GetParamIntValue
methods.description: Gets an integer parameter value for marking.

methods.name: Marking_GetParamUlongValue
methods.description: Gets an unsigned long parameter value for marking.
